post.text: Wow! I am in Jacksonville, Florida! This is a MOVEMENT - join me for a few minutes!

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Pray for a better America and Donald will do that. NO Hilary. America will be lost forever.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: thank you Miranda. We can all use prayers when our country is run by people who lie to our face, get caught, and lie when they are caught. We need someone who will reach down and pick people up. That is one of the best ways to help people. Show them the way, teach them skills and let them earn their way back to a great life. Thank you for the prayer.
